This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: white stationary object high in daytime sky . then started to move and then reversed direction.
divs: Sighting Detailsafter seeing an all white jumbo jet without any markings pass above me, i noticed high above a small white object sitting motionless . it did not move for at least 3-4 minutes. i then ran inside and returned with my camera canon 20 d with zoom lens. i took about 10 shots and called a neighbor mike over to ask him to witness it. he agreed he could not figure out what it could be? i asked him to remain there as i ran in to get my tripod. when i returned, we then noticed it was moving slowly west and away from us. i took about 10 more photos , 24 in all. then to my surprise it stopped and started moving back towards the direction it started from. this made me realize it could not be anything in orbit such as a planet , a satellite or the space station. i took a few more photos as it hid behind the clouds and behind the side of my building. when i downloaded the images, i was surprised to find it changing shape in every shot. i could not believe this was any kind of balloon or conventional craft i have ever seen or heard about. the way this object sat motionless for over 3 minutes was most notable. i checked this by in referencing the object to my building and the telephone wires. then moving and changing direction was quite amazing and perplexing. i truly felt i witnessed something beyond the normal explanation. i also felt i acted with quick decision to get a camera, tripod and a witness to what i saw.
